column6:
"All right, bub. Gimme my appearance schedule,2008,11
for October..."
"Sure, Mr. Logan! There's your regular solo title,
of course. Plus, the usual line-up of team books."
"So that's just UNCANNY, ASTONISHING, NEW
AVENGERS and X-FORCE. No prob."
"There's also your side projects. ORIGINS, FIRST CLASS, MANIFEST DESTINY, another FIRST CLASS..."
"Uh huh. Anythin' else?"
"Don't forget cameos! Possibly AVENGERS/INVADERS... maybe a SECRET INVASION appearance..."
"Hmph. Sounds like a light month to me. Think I got room for one more book. You got anythin' FUN?"
"Actually..."
All Ages ...$2.99
column8: | penciller:Gurihiru | writer:Chris Giarrusso | writer:Marc Sumerak | letterer:Dave Sharpe | other:Akihide Yanagi
